title: Deadweight loss on negative externality graph

content.description: The following questions refer to the following diagram, which shows the marginal social cost (MSC), the marginal private cost (MPC), and the marginal social benefit (MSB) associated with the production of a good in a market.
content.question: Which of the following describes the type of externality generated by the unregulated private market and the resulting deadweight loss?

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
